1432.content: The boy feels hungry and heads toward the food truck area. You sit up on his flip flop between his toes. The smell was not bad as the shoe was open. You smell food and realize he was in line for a food truck to get food. He steps up to the window finally and orders...
1432.title: Food truck

choices: ...fall off when the boy suddenly stands back up?
144.content:
Finally reaching the boy's leg, Chad was grateful for the fact that he was wearing sweatpants. The boy hadn't even noticed the shrunken man's two-inch-tall presence since he was more focused on the game he was playing on his phone. Chad took this opportunity to grip the blue fabric and begin scaling his leg. He just prayed the boy could sit still for a few more minutes until he reached the top of his knee.

Does Chad...
144.title: Hiking

choices: A candy dish on the desk
15.content:
Looking around chad seemed to be about an inch tall. Chad dodged shoes, dropped trash, and the occasional stroller wheel. Finally making it to the security office, Chad climbs up the lip of the door way, and bolts towards the desk. Coming to a stop chad is upset that it’s empty. His partner was supposed to be here while he did rounds. With nothing to do but wait, chad decided to climb the lamp wire up onto the desk.

After 30 minutes of climbing chad rolls onto the desk top and lays there for a bit. Chad nearly falls asleep when he hears his partner, Billy, walk in holding a plate. Standing up quickly, chad runs across the desk towards where the chair is, hoping he will be seen. Jumping up and down waving his arms while screaming doesn’t work. Billy seems to be talking to someone. Chad looks over and sees a young boy crying. The kid must be lost. Billy turns to look at the boy while setting the plate on the desk. The displaced air hits chad and send him flying upwards. Looking down chad sees he’s going to land....
15.title: The security office

choices: Chad falls onto one of the Oreos
Chad tries to eat off one of the Oreos
The boy stars to lick the Powdered Sugar off the plate
152.content: You were thrown into the air after Billy placed the plate onto the desk next to the boy. You had no idea where you would land. You finally began to fall and landed on the plate Billy sat onto desk. You sat up surrounded by Deep Fried Oreos Billy had gotten for the boy to cheer him up. You looked up as the giant boys hand came down and grabbed one of the Oreos and began to eat it. You knew you needed to get off the plate before the boy ate you.
152.title: On the plate of food

choices: Your to late he closes his mouth and swallows you
1521.content:
After watching the boy gulp down the first Oreo, you snap out of it and scrambled to get off the plate. He grabbed another cookie,causing the plate to shake, and you lost your footing.

You stumbled backwards into a cookie and leaned against it. Sighing in relief that you didn’t hurt your self, you go to push off the cookie, but find yourself stuck. You had landed on a bit of frosting from the center of the Oreo. The frosting was soft and sticky from being fried, and you stuck to it like glue. No matter how much you struggled, it only seemed to hold tight to you.

You to preoccupied with the struggling, that you don’t see the boy grab the cookie your stuck to. Suddenly going airborne you scream as the cookie is turned and you are pointed st his mouth. You struggled harder as the cookie is brought towards his mouth. You can feel his breath rush over you as your part of the cookie is inserted into his mouth. Your screams are drowned out by the loud crunch of his biting the cookie.

You’re tossed around in his mouth as he chews the cookie. Saliva, mushed cookie, his tongue, and his hot breath is all you know in the darkness. A few times you hit a hard surface and avoid being chewed up by his teeth. You break free of the cookie chuck your stuck to and try to head towards the light you occasionally see as as he chews. It’s hard, but you make it to his lips and....
1521.title: Chad falls onto one of the Oreos

15213.content:
Without even thinking he jumped but he didn't see where he was heading so he closed his eyes.


Still freefalling not knowing where he's going to land.... then he feels that you landed on something, but what you landed on was slanted and he started to tumble(eyes are still closed)... Then it comes to a complete stop. he open his eyes and see that it's pitch black still wondering where you are.










What do you want to chad to be?
15213.title: You jump out

info.brief_description: Chad, An 18 year old security guard shrinks on his rounds while at work at the state fair.
info.description:
Chad is working the county fair when he shrinks while doing his rounds. He is the size of a grain of salt so he is not easily seen or felt.

Chad is 18


No interaction with adults or females.
No death, he is immune to death
Chaf does not enjoy any of the interaction he encounters so please make sure not to make him enjoy it because he does not.

Try to keep interaction 15 years old or less.

Try to keep it unaware as long as possible.

Please be descriptive.... NO ONE SENTENCE CHAPTERS!!

If you read, please help add. This story will only grow with your help. Any questions please ask.
